EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Test Automation for Beginners - English - 2015.07.28.Email - Follow Up
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you at our Test Automation for Beginners webinar!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Test Automation for Beginners
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Sorry we missed you at our recent webinar, Test Automation for Beginners! Roman Zednik from the Tricentis Pre-Sales Consulting team, shared the basics of test automation, starting with the current market outlook on software test automation and ending with end-to-end test automation over different technologies.
If you would like to see what you missed, a recording of our webinar is available here <http://www.tricentis.com/thank-you-page-test-automation-for-beginners-webinar-20150728-ondemand>.
If you would like to stay up to date, please follow us on Twitter @Tricentis <https://twitter.com/Tricentis>. For any additional questions, please feel free to follow and tweet our Support Team @TricentisSpprt <https://twitter.com/TricentisSpprt>.
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
Roman Zednik Pre-Sales Consultant Tricentis
